reviewPrompt.title: Enjoying collecting?
reviewPrompt.message: Tell the world about WordDex on the App Store! As a solo developer, it's a huge help!

camera.title: Take Picture
camera.description: Tap here to take a photo of text you want to learn. The camera will scan and create flashcards from your photos.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Choose an existing photo from your gallery to create flashcards from. Great for images you've saved previously.

flashcards.title: View your Collection
flashcards.description: Access your flashcard collection to organize, edit, and manage your saved cards.

customCard.title: Add Custom Card
customCard.description: Create a custom flashcard manually by entering text directly. Perfect for adding cards without taking a photo.

reviewCards.title: Review Cards
reviewCards.description: This area is where your captured flashcards will appear for review. Swipe right to take cards out of the review session. Swipe left to review cards again.  The flip flashcard and see image buttons will be on the bottom right of your flashcards.

collections.title: Collections
collections.description: Tap here to select which deck of flashcards you want to review.  Long press a deck to isolate it. You can choose multiple collections to review cards from all of them at once.

reviewButton.title: Review Button
reviewButton.description: Tap this button to start an SRS (Spaced Repetition System) review session with your selected decks. A flashing rainbow button means there are cards available for review! Long press the button to reset the SRS tracking for all cards in the selected decks.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage translation languages, subscription plan, sign out, and other account settings here.

galleryConfirm.title: Upload from Gallery
galleryConfirm.description: Let's try uploading an image from the gallery. After you choose one, we'll guide you through rotate, crop, and highlight.

rotate.title: Rotate Image
rotate.description: Rotate your photo if you need before cropping or highlighting text.

crop.title: Crop Image
crop.description: Crop the photo to the important area so you only process the text you need.

highlight.title: Highlight Text
highlight.description: Let's try highlighting some text in the image. Use the rainbow highlighter to highlight the text you want to translate.

confirmHighlight.title: Confirm Selection
confirmHighlight.description: Does the rainbow highlight neatly surround text that you want to translate? If so, press next, and then the checkmark, if not, press the back button and try again.

translateButton.title: Translate
translateButton.description: Tap here to translate your detected text into your target language. The translation will appear below along with pronunciation guides if applicable.

wordscopeButton.title: Wordscope
wordscopeButton.description: This powerful tool provides both translation AND detailed analysis of the text - including a grammar breakdown, usage examples, common mistakes, context, and possible synonyms. It's perfect for deeper learning!

editTextButton.title: Edit Text
editTextButton.description: Tap here to edit the detected text in case there are words you don't need or want to modify before translating.  If everything looks good, go ahead and tap either the translate or Wordscope button!

chooseTranslation.title: Ready to Translate!
chooseTranslation.description: Now tap either Translate for a quick translation, or Wordscope for a deeper analysis. Both will process your text and prepare it for saving as a flashcard!

saveButton.title: Save Flashcard
saveButton.description: Tap here to save your new flashcard to your collection. You can organize cards into different decks!

viewSavedButton.title: View Saved Flashcards
viewSavedButton.description: Tap here to browse all your saved flashcards. You can review, edit, or delete cards from your collection.

editTranslationButton.title: Edit Translation
editTranslationButton.description: Not happy with the translation? Tap here to manually edit the translated text or pronunciation guide before saving.

editInputRetranslateButton.title: Edit & Retranslate
editInputRetranslateButton.description: Need to change the original text? Tap here to edit your input and get a fresh translation.

finalSavePrompt.title: Save Your First Flashcard!
finalSavePrompt.description: Now just tap this button to save your first flashcard to your collection!

congratulations.description: You've saved your first flashcard! Here's to many more! Cheers! ü•≥
